formalpara.title: Interner Hilfetext zu diesem AMI-Befehl in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen: Action: PlayDTMF Synopsis: Play DTMF signal on a specific channel. Privilege: call,all Description: Plays a dtmf digit on the specified channel. Variables: (all are required) Channel: Channel name to send digit to Digit: The dtmf digit to play
